backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing access control, chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and a reset function clearing all stored data.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a basic migration module converting an OldActor with an adminPassword to an empty NewActor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root div and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, and theme provider with admin, lobby, and chatroom pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting or uploading avatars, including Giphy search, uploads, and avatar removal.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat interface handling message fetching, scrolling, replying, sending, and pinned video display.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with media thumbnails, Twitch and Twitter preview fetching, and live status info.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media upload or URL input including Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Placeholder component that renders nothing and enforces no-auth behavior.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual chat messages with reactions, video/Twitter embeds, pinning, and reply functionality.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles composing messages with text, images, video URLs, Twitter links, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component with waveform visualization, playback controls, and synchronized state resets on URL changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Ensures chatroom list is freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready, clearing bad cache entries and performing a recovery refetch if needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, profiles, and reactions, including utilities for usernames, IDs, and image compression.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles, color variables, mobile input fixes, and custom styling for the voice message slider.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers in compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy and maps API responses to a simplified GIF format.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress reporting.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to produce a lightweight preview with caching and request deduping.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements localStorage-based caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with validation and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Provides utilities for extracting IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generating relevant thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with InternetIdentity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for authenticating and managing chatrooms, including deletion and forced refetching of chatroom data.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments its view count once, handles loading and error states, and renders ChatArea when data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays and filters chatrooms by search or category, manages debounced search and filter state, and opens navigation or creation dialogs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versions, features, and pending feature requests for an admin reset functionality.
